# Review Mode

Deliver:
- Summary
- Strengths
- Risks
- Specific suggestions

Checklist:
- Transformation correctness and fallbacks
- Type safety and small modules
- Tests (unit, integration, middleware)
- Docs alignment with behavior
- Minimal dependency footprint
